summary: Adds a new item called \"Daedric Ingot\"
descriptionHtml:
In vanilla skyrim, daedric items can only be made with a combination of ebony ingots and a daedra heart. I simply made a mod that combines the two. You can now make an item that would normally require 3 ebony ingots and a daedra heart with only 3 daedric ingots. You can also break down existing items into deadric ingots (only way to get them actually) to allow you to change what item you have easily.

Conversion table on amount of ingots-

Armor:
Boots = 3
Cuirass = 5
Gauntlets = 2
Helmet = 3
Shield = 4

Weapons:
BattleAxe = 5
Bow = 3
Dagger = 1
Greatsword = 5
Mace = 3
Sword = 2
WarAxe = 2
Warhammer = 5


Also available on the Steam Workshop. Check the mirrors tab for the link.

Please feel free to comment!
author: RADIALTHRONE1
